trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration element that specifies additional settings for an issued token.
trans-unit.target: 表示組態項目，指定已發行權杖其他設定。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.IssuedTokenParametersElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.IssuedTokenParametersElement"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of configuration elements that specifies extra information.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定額外資訊的組態項目集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of configuration elements that specifies extra information.
trans-unit.target: 指定額外資訊的組態項目集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of required claim types.
trans-unit.target: 取得必要的宣告型別的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of required claim types.
trans-unit.target: 必要的宣告型別的集合。

trans-unit.source: Each element in the collection is a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ClaimTypeElement"></xref> instance whose <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ClaimTypeElement.ClaimType*> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的每個項目是<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ClaimTypeElement"></xref>執行個體，其<xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ClaimTypeElement.ClaimType*>屬性設定。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ClaimTypeElement.ClaimType*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default message security version to be used with this binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要搭配此繫結使用的預設訊息安全性版本。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion> that provides information about the versions of the security specifications, (WS-Security, WS-Trust, WS-Secure Conversation and WS-Security Policy), that must be supported by the binding.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion>提供的安全性規格版本的相關資訊 (Ws-security、 Ws-trust、 Ws-secure Conversation 和 Ws-security Policy)，必須繫結所支援。</xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion>

trans-unit.source: Gets a configuration element that specifies the endpoint that issues the current token.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定發行目前權杖之端點的組態項目。

trans-unit.source: A configuration element that specifies the endpoint that issues the current token.
trans-unit.target: 指定發行目前權杖的端點組態項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a configuration element that specifies additional information of the token issuer.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定權杖簽發者的其他資訊的組態項目。

trans-unit.source: A configuration element that specifies additional information of the token issuer.
trans-unit.target: 指定權杖簽發者的詳細資訊的組態項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the issuance key.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定發行金鑰大小。

trans-unit.source: The size of the issuance key.
trans-unit.target: 發行金鑰大小。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 256.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 256。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of key to be issued.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要發行的索引鍵的類型。

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyType"></xref> value that specifies the type of key to be issued.
trans-unit.target: 有效<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyType"></xref>值，指定要發行的索引鍵的類型。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of token to be used in issuance.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要用在發行的權杖類型。

trans-unit.source: The type of token to be used in issuance.
trans-unit.target: 要用在發行的權杖類型。

trans-unit.source: The default is http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/oasis-wss-saml-token-profile-1.1#SAML.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/oasis-wss-saml-token-profile-1.1#SAML。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the issued token parameter uses STR transformation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值指出是否已發行的權杖參數會使用 STR 轉換。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the issued token parameter uses STR transformation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已發行權杖的參數使用 STR 轉換。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
